translation.en: [man] Classic, this.
♪ And I ain't got nothing to say ♪ -Shut up! -I know, it sounds great.
It really hasn't dated at all.
-Don't be late. -I won't. Good luck with the selection.
Don't let the fact that I've made A-team every year add to the pressure.
translation.de: Mach dir keinen Stress, weil ich immer ins erste Team kam.

translation.en: You'll be fine.
-Dickhead. -Hey.
-Warning. -A-team dickhead.
Can we please get this crap off?
-That's strike two. -[music stops]
That's not even swearing.
Dad, "crap" is not swearing.
-All right, mate. -Hey. You're not playing, Adam?
-Playing? -Yeah, Dads V Lads.
Dads V Lads?
Oh, shit... Uh, shoot. Um...
Sorry. It's Dads V Lads. I... forgot.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Väter gehen Söhne hatte ich vergessen.

translation.en: Right. Right, it looks like we've found our goalie.
translation.de: Na gut. Dann haben wir unseren Torwart gefunden.

translation.en: Here's to total humiliation by kids.
translation.de: Auf die Demütigung durch unsere Kinder.

translation.en: Speak for yourself. I thought I had a good game.
translation.de: Sprich für dich. Ich war gut.

translation.en: [Adam] Oh, god. He's putting up a flip chart.
translation.de: Oh Gott. Er stellt das Flipchart auf.

translation.en: [man] Wait till he hands out the agenda.
-Last year it was laminated. -[phone ringing]
It's Corinne.
Tell her I've been on teacher trips. I know what goes on.
translation.de: Sag ihr, ich weiß, was auf Lehrausflügen abgeht.

translation.en: Hey, babe. How's the conference? [Corinne] Aw, it's tough, it's really tough.
translation.de: -Hey, Schatz. Wie ist die Konferenz? -Anstrengend. Echt anstrengend.

translation.en: I'm currently recuperating after a hot bath and two glasses of Rioja.
translation.de: Ich erhole mich gerade von einem Bad und zwei Gläsern Rioja.

translation.en: Well, me and the boys are on a pub crawl. Ryan's getting the Sambucas in.
translation.de: Die Jungs und ich sind auf Kneipentour. Ryan holt Sambucas.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Where are you? Football? -Yeah.
Hey, listen, did you know it was dads and lads?
Yeah, I wrote it on the note.
-What note? -The one that's attached to the fridge.
-What fridge? -Oh, ha ha.
Listen, will you text me when you know which team he's on?
translation.de: Schreib mir, in welchem Team er ist.

translation.en: Oh, God, I hope it's the A.
Tom's really winding him up, and this Ryan swearing thing...
translation.de: Tom setzt ihn unter Druck, und Ryans Gefluche...

translation.en: I know. God, it's a nightmare.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Das ist ein Albtraum.

translation.en: Potty-mouthed little prick. Takes after his mother.
translation.de: Das Schandmaul hat er von der Mutter.

translation.en: Oh, God.
Bob's agenda. You're not gonna believe this.
Bob's agenda...
has got 26 items on it.
Ah, yeah, well, I'm... I'm just gutted I can't be there.
translation.de: Ja, na ja, ich wäre zu gern dabei.

translation.en: I'm sure you are. I think you've done this on purpose.
translation.de: Ganz bestimmt. Das war doch Absicht.

translation.en: I don't think there even is a conference. I'm gonna ask the other teachers.
translation.de: Gibt es die Konferenz wirklich? Ich frage die anderen Lehrer.

translation.en: Actually, know what? I better get going.
I have got dinner in half an hour.
All right, love. Well, you enjoy yourself.
Oh, yeah, I will. I fully intend to.
translation.de: Oh ja, das habe ich vor.

translation.en: Love you. Yeah, love you. Bye.
Bye.
Wife left you to it, has she?
Ah, yeah, she's away. -Calls it work. -Hmm.
translation.de: Ja, sie ist verreist. Sie nennt es Arbeit.

translation.en: So have you got a kid playing in the match or what?
translation.de: Spielt Ihr Kind in der Mannschaft?

translation.en: No.
You didn't have to stay with her, you know.
What?
Corinne. You didn't have to stay when she told you she was pregnant.
translation.de: Als Corinne schwanger wurde, hätten Sie gehen können.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Do... do I know you?
Two years ago, she told you she was pregnant, right? That's why you stayed.
translation.de: Vor zwei Jahren sagte sie, sie sei schwanger. Sie blieben.

translation.en: She told you she was pregnant and then she lost the baby.
translation.de: Danach sagte sie, sie hätte das Baby verloren.

translation.en: -Who are you? -She lied, Adam.
She made it up. She was never pregnant.
Who are you? Why are you saying this?
translation.de: Wer sind Sie? Warum sagen Sie das?

translation.en: Does that really matter?
Yeah, it does.
Okay. Think of me as a stranger. A stranger that knows.
translation.de: Ok. Betrachten Sie mich als eine Fremde. Eine Fremde, die Bescheid weiß.

translation.en: She had a bump.
It was fake.
Cast your mind back to that time. Did you ever see her naked?
translation.de: Denken Sie zurück. Haben Sie sie nackt gesehen?

translation.en: Fully naked?
It wasn't real.
Excuses to avoid sex and sickness.
translation.de: Ausreden, um Sex zu vermeiden, Krankheiten.

translation.en: When the miscarriage came, you look back and realized the pregnancy had been difficult from the start.
translation.de: Nach der Fehlgeburt wurde Ihnen klar, dass die Schwangerschaft schwierig war.

translation.en: [inhales] It's gone.
How do you know my wife? Who the hell are you?
translation.de: Woher kennen Sie meine Frau? Wer sind Sie?

translation.en: All right, folks, grab your beers. Let's get this show on the road.
translation.de: Ok, Leute, holt euer Bier. Lasst die Show beginnen.

translation.en: [sighs] Think of me as a friend that just released you from prison.
translation.de: Ich bin eine Freundin, die Sie aus dem Gefängnis holt.

translation.en: You're full of shit.
-You should be thanking me. -Yeah? Why is that?
Because now you know she's a liar.
translation.de: Weil Sie jetzt wissen, dass sie lügt.

translation.en: She faked the whole thing.
-[man] Adam? -Yeah.
If you need proof, look at your Visa card and check for a charge to Novelty Funsy.
translation.de: Suchen Sie in Ihrer Visa-Abrechnung nach einer Abbuchung von Novelty Funsy.

translation.en: And one more thing.
If I were you... I'd run DNA checks on your two boys.
translation.de: An Ihrer Stelle würde ich die DNA der Jungs testen lassen.

translation.en: Hey. Wait.
Stop!
Who are you?!
It's gone. I've lost it.
translation.de: Es ist weg. Ich habe es verloren.

translation.en: I'm sorry I wasn't here.
I love you so much.
Hi, this is Corinne. Leave a message.
Hey, it's me.
Doesn't matter.
[man] Made the A-team. Good result.
[Adam] Absolutely.
Yeah, except Jimmy Hoch making the A's.
translation.de: Ja, außer, dass Jimmy Hoch auch dabei ist.

translation.en: What's that all about?
-Yeah, well-- -What?
Ah, you know me, Adam. I'm not one for gossip. Bob lost his job.
translation.de: Du weißt, ich mag keinen Tratsch. Bob ist arbeitslos.

translation.en: Since when?
Six weeks ago. But he doesn't want anyone knowing.
translation.de: Sechs Wochen. Es soll keiner wissen.

translation.en: Anyway, he has this headhunter helping him find a job.
translation.de: Jedenfalls hilft ihm ein Headhunter bei der Jobsuche.

translation.en: This very successful headhunter.
Jimmy's dad? You're kidding. That's outrageous.
Come on, you're a lawyer.
This shit happens all the time.
When it comes to looking after ourselves and our kids, then... [sucks teeth] ...we're all corrupt.
translation.de: Wenn es um uns und unsere Kinder geht, sind wir alle korrupt.

translation.en: All right, see you tomorrow, mate.
[quietly] The fuck?
She made it up. She was never pregnant.
Now you know she's a liar.
translation.de: Jetzt wissen Sie, dass sie lügt.

translation.en: [recorded voice] To help us deal with your call quickly,
please tell us in a few words why you are calling today.
translation.de: sagen Sie uns bitte kurz, warum Sie heute anrufen.

translation.en: Query, payments, card transactions.
I'm sorry. Could you repeat that?
Card transactions.
-I'm sorry. Could you repeat that? -Speak to a fucking human being!
Please hold while we connect you to one of our representatives.
translation.de: Bitte warten. Sie werden mit einem Mitarbeiter verbunden.

translation.en: Hello. My name's Peter. How can I help you today?
translation.de: Ich heiße Peter. Was kann ich für Sie tun?

translation.en: Yeah, there's a... there's a charge on my account from a while back that I don't recognize.
translation.de: Auf meinem Konto gab es eine Abbuchung, die ich nicht zuordnen kann.

translation.en: I think it might be a mistake.
-What's the name of the company? -Novelty Funsy.
How are you spelling Funsy?
Fun-sy. S-Y.
And the date of the transaction?
January...
fifteenth. January 15th, 2017.
Ah, yeah. Some companies don't bill under their real name. It's for discretion.
translation.de: Ja. Manche Firmen nutzen falsche Namen aus Gründen der Diskretion.

translation.en: Discretion?
Yeah, like in hotels when adult movies appear as something else.
translation.de: Ja, wie bei Erotikfilmen auf Hotelrechnungen.

translation.en: -Uh, so what is it? -It's an online retailer,
translation.de: Also, was ist es? Ein Onlinehandel.

translation.en: so I'll need to raise a specific inquiry if you're sure this is something that you didn't purchase.
translation.de: Ich frage es ab, wenn Sie sicher sind, dass ein Fehler vorliegt.

translation.en: Yep, I'm sure.
I'll raise the inquiry. Can we get back to you on this number?
translation.de: Ich prüfe es. Kann ich Sie zurückrufen?

translation.en: -Yep, thank you. -Have a good evening.
[Tom] Dad?
-Is it okay if Daisy stays? -I'll sleep in the spare room.
Did you ask your mum? Yeah, she's cool with it.
Okay.
How did Ryan get on?
Yep, made the A.
Brother of their star player. It was inevitable.
translation.de: Als Bruder eines Starspielers war es unvermeidlich.

translation.en: Dais.
-I just-- -I know.
We're gonna be going away...
Different unis.
I just... -I don't want it to be a big thing. -It won't.
translation.de: -Es soll... keine große Sache werden. -Das wird es nicht.

translation.en: I promise.
Look, we're casual. No strings.
translation.de: Wir halten es locker. Ganz zwanglos.

translation.en: This is a very casual kiss.
What?
[loud whisper] Hey.
Why didn't you just text?
[loud whisper] Prefer this. Old school.
Two minutes.
Turn on your side.
[woman 1] So, uh...
guess what? I finally told him.
translation.de: Stell dir vor, ich hab's ihm endlich gesagt.

translation.en: [woman 2] Oh, my God. How was it?
translation.de: Oh mein Gott. Wie lief es ab?

translation.en: Surprisingly mature.
-Huh, really? -I know.
What did you say?
Sit.
Just the truth. You know, I said that--
translation.de: Na ja, die Wahrheit. Ich sagte...

translation.en: Sit! Now come here. Now, sit!
No, no, no! Sit!
I said we've had 26 years.
Many of them happy, and that's not a failure, that's a success.
translation.de: Viele waren glücklich. Das kann man als Erfolg werten.

translation.en: -But, you know-- -[phone beeping]
Oh.
But, you know, now it's time for something else.
translation.de: Aber es wird Zeit für etwas Neues.

translation.en: I tried a new house analogy,
translation.de: Ich verglich es mit einem neuen Haus,

translation.en: but that all got a bit muddled.
translation.de: aber irgendwie habe ich mich verhaspelt.

translation.en: Was he upset?
Hard to tell with Phil. He slept in the spare room,
translation.de: Weiß man bei Phil nie. Er schlief im Gästezimmer.

translation.en: but I think that was mostly symbolic.
translation.de: Aber das war wohl eher symbolisch.

translation.en: -God. -[phone beeping]
Christ.
Sorry, the infant keeps calling me. I better find out what he wants.
translation.de: Sorry, der Kleine ruft an. Ich gehe mal ran.

translation.en: -Can I call you back? -Right.
What is it?
I'll tell you what it is, some fucking weird shit.
What are you doing on that thing?
translation.de: Was machst du mit dem Ding?

translation.en: "Investigating crime, really brutal. LOL."
Ooh, you're showing your age now, Jo. It's Johanna. How many times with that?
translation.de: -Man merkt dir dein Alter an, Jo. -Ich heiße Johanna. Wie oft noch?

translation.en: And anyway, I thought you liked us oldies.
translation.de: Und ich dachte, du magst uns Oldies.

translation.en: He's not that old. He's not, like, your age.
translation.de: So alt wie du ist er nicht.

translation.en: You said your new man was old enough to be your father.
translation.de: Du sagtest, er könnte dein Vater sein.

translation.en: Yes, technically, but you're actually old enough to be my mother.
translation.de: Theoretisch, aber du könntest wirklich meine Mutter sein.

translation.en: And even mathematically, my gran.
Where's the body?
Don't you dare.
You've not seen the head?
No. No, it's just that, lying there like that.
translation.de: Nein, das ist alles. Es lag einfach so da.

translation.en: Oh, it's giving me the creeps.
What is it?
Some kind of sheep?
-No, the neck's too long. -Giraffe?
Joking. [bystander 1] Too small.
I'm guessing, but llama.
Alpaca.
What do you think's going on there, on the leg?
translation.de: Was ist mit dem Bein los?

translation.en: -Are they bite marks? -[bystander 2] I can't look anymore.
translation.de: Sind das Bissspuren? Ich kann nicht hinsehen.

translation.en: Bite marks.
And judging from the size and the shape of the indents...
translation.de: Anhand der Größe und der Form der Einkerbungen

translation.en: I'd say there's a reasonable chance that they're human.
translation.de: würde ich sagen, dass es ein Mensch war.

translation.en: [woman] Hello.
-Ah, hello-- -Hi. We're from--
Hello, I'm... DS Johanna Griffin.
translation.de: Hallo, ich bin... DS Johanna Griffin.

translation.en: This is DC Wesley Ross. There's no cause for concern.
translation.de: Das ist DC Wesley Ross. Es gibt keinen Grund, beunruhigt zu sein.

translation.en: We're just looking into an incident about a mile or so from here which involves an animal.
translation.de: Wir ermitteln in einem Fall, bei dem es um ein Tier geht.

translation.en: Looks very much like a white alpaca.
translation.de: Sieht aus wie ein weißes Alpaka.

translation.en: You think it's one of mine?
Well, logic dictates. You know, they're not the most common-- [woman] We'll soon see.
translation.de: -Wäre anzunehmen, es gibt nicht viele... -Wissen wir gleich.

translation.en: They're all there.
Liam,
Niall...
Harry, Zayn...
It's Louis.
What's happened? Is he dead?
Uh, I-- I'm afraid so. Yes, I'm... I'm sorry.
translation.de: Ich fürchte ja. Es tut mir leid.

translation.en: And he's... he's been...
decapitated.
Decapitated?
Have you got any CCTV? You know, any... visual security?
translation.de: Haben Sie hier Videoüberwachung, ein Sicherheitssystem?

translation.en: It's an alpaca farm, not Port Knox.
translation.de: Das ist ist eine Alpakafarm, nicht Port Knox.

translation.en: [woman] Oh, shit.
It's "Fort" Knox. It's where the Americans keep their gold.
translation.de: Es heißt Fort Knox. Da lagern die Amerikaner ihr Gold.

translation.en: I know.
Really?
No, I'm thinking of Alcatraz.
[boy] Hey, Mr. Price.
Mike. When did you arrive?
translation.de: Mike. Seit wann bist du hier?

translation.en: Kind of earlier.
I didn't hear ya.
Right. No.
Tom upstairs?
Shower.
-Hey. -You've got three.
-Give me the pancake. -[phone rings]
I still want it.
-Hello. -Gross.
[man] It's Martin. That Parth fella has just turned up.
translation.de: Martin hier. Dieser Parth ist hier.

translation.en: Shit. Uh...
I'm on my way.
-Hey, bud. -Mike?
Now.
Hello?
[man 1] In here.
Where is he?
Oh, he's safe.
-Martin. -[man 2] Hello?
-[man 2] Is someone there? -[Martin] He's down there.
-The cellar? -Yep.
[man 2] It's not fucking Silence of the Lambs.
translation.de: Das ist nicht Schweigen der Lämmer.

translation.en: Okay. Um...
Professionally speaking, I have to tell you that this is...
translation.de: Aus rechtlicher Sicht ist das eine...

translation.en: -Don't listen to him! He's mental. -...kidnap.
-[man 2] He's absolutely mental! -Bullshit.
Well, you are kind of holding him against his will.
translation.de: Nun, du hältst ihn gegen seinen Willen fest.

translation.en: I was a cop for 30 years, Adam.
-I understand the definition of kidnap. -[distant banging]
translation.de: Ich weiß, was eine Entführung ist.

translation.en: -The door closed behind him. -[man 2] Let me out!
translation.de: -Die Tür fiel einfach zu. -Lasst mich raus!

translation.en: Okay.
-[man 2] I can't breathe! -Uh...
Do you mind if I...?
Be my guest.
But remember whose side you're on.
translation.de: Denk dran, auf wessen Seite du stehst.

translation.en: All right! All right! All right!
Are you fucking kidding me? I've been down there nearly an hour.
translation.de: Sind Sie irre? Ich war eine Stunde da drin.

translation.en: Forty-three minutes.
You're crazy. He's crazy. Okay, just calm down.
Calm down? I'm calling the police.
-Give me me phone. -I haven't got it.
-Give him his phone. -He's stolen me fuckin' phone!
translation.de: -Er hat mir mein Handy geklaut! -Gib's ihm.

translation.en: -He's an old man. -Fuck off.
You are. He's an old man that doesn't want to move.
translation.de: Ein alter Mann, der nicht umziehen will.

translation.en: Doesn't wanna sell. He's not interested in your redevelopment program.
translation.de: Er will nicht verkaufen und keine Sanierung.

translation.en: And he really doesn't appreciate you showing up here unannounced,
translation.de: Er will nicht, dass Sie unangekündigt herkommen

translation.en: waving your big, fat, corporate checkbook around.
Now, we've lodged our objection, we've adhered to the deadline, and now due process needs to take place.
translation.de: Wir haben Einspruch eingereicht, und jetzt entscheidet das Gericht.

translation.en: And due process can be very, very slow.
translation.de: Und so ein Prozess kann sich lange hinziehen.

translation.en: Cup of tea, anyone?
Okay, you're his lawyer. How much does he want?
translation.de: Ok, Sie sind sein Anwalt. Wie viel will er?

translation.en: A billion pounds.
I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized to go as high as 400,000.
translation.de: Ich sollte Ihnen das nicht sagen, aber ich darf 400.000 bieten.

translation.en: I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized to say no to whatever you offer.
translation.de: Ich sollte Ihnen das nicht sagen, aber ich darf jedes Angebot ablehnen.

translation.en: He can't win, the stupid, old fuck!
translation.de: Der alte Sack hat keine Chance!

translation.en: And tricks like that...
Yeah... smile it up, asshole.
You know and I know, everyone's got their price.
translation.de: Wir wissen beide, dass jeder käuflich ist.

translation.en: -Have they? -Yeah.
And in the end, trust me, the big guy always wins.
translation.de: Und am Ende gewinnt immer der Größere.

translation.en: Lanky streak of piss.
[Adam] Behave.
-You think she sleeps with her alpacas? -[Johanna] Nope.
Not sex, just cuddles.
Maybe gets one in now and again on a cold winter's night.
translation.de: Vielleicht ab und zu an kalten Winterabenden.

translation.en: I know a lad who used to sleep with a massive red setter,
translation.de: Ich kannte mal einen, der seinen riesigen Setter

translation.en: like, under the covers, its head on his pillow.
I said, "Is that not a little--" Stop!
What? What is it?
Back there, drive back.
[Johanna] What is it?
Wes, where are we going?
Right.
There's more.
Jesus. Creepy.
There's a shoe.
[Wesley] Something's not right here.
Yeah.
Footprints. Not shoes, feet.
[Wesley] Johanna! Johanna!
Shit.
[Wesley] Over here!
[Johanna] Get an ambulance and call for backup!
Shit.
DC Ross, assistance required, also an ambulance right now.
translation.de: DC Ross hier, wir brauchen sofort einen Krankenwagen...

translation.en: He's alive!
Hello.
[man] Hi. Is that Mr. Price?
Speaking.
Hi. It's Hashim from Derwent Bank.
translation.de: Hier ist Hashim von der Derwent Bank.

translation.en: I believe you put in a request last night for the identity of a company that has the billing name...
translation.de: Sie baten gestern Abend um Auskunft zu einer Firma namens...

translation.en: Novelty Funsy.
Yeah, that's right.
Right. Well, I'm afraid we can't identify exactly what the payment relates to.
translation.de: Wir können leider nicht genau sagen, worauf sich die Zahlung bezieht.

translation.en: It seems to be an umbrella title that covers several different websites.
translation.de: Der Name der Firma deckt offenbar mehrere Websites ab.

translation.en: Uh, okay. No worries.
I've got a list of the ISP addresses, which I'm happy to send you,
translation.de: Ich kann Ihnen eine Liste der ISP-Adressen zusenden,

translation.en: but obviously, I can't identify which of these, if any, is the source of the purchase.
translation.de: weiß allerdings nicht, bei welcher der Einkauf getätigt wurde.

translation.en: Would you like me to email this to the address we have on file?
translation.de: Soll ich sie an Ihre E-Mail-Adresse schicken?

translation.en: Um, yeah, sure, of course.
-I'll send it over now. -Please.
Thank you.
Sorry. Work call.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Das war beruflich.

translation.en: Back early?
Yeah. The lunch thing got canceled.
-Thank God. -[door opens]
[Corinne] Hey, you made the A-team.
translation.de: Hey, du bist im ersten Team.

translation.en: Oh, come here. Let me hug you.
-Mum. -Oh, come on.
God, none of your friends are watching.
How was the conference? Did Selena behave herself?
translation.de: Wie war es? War Selena anständig?

translation.en: Uh, Serena was perfectly professional,
right up until the point she dashed outside to vomit.
translation.de: bis sie rausrannte und kotzen musste.

translation.en: Coffee?
-Yeah, I'll do it. -Come on, I wanna hear all about footy.
Oh, Corinne?
Hi. Is Daisy still here?
Oh, yeah, she stayed the night.
[woman] I need her to look after Ella for an hour.
She was supposed to play hockey but suddenly decided--
translation.de: Sie sollte zum Hockey, aber plötzlich...

translation.en: I haven't suddenly decided.
[woman] Okay. Well, she's got a stomach ache.
translation.de: Ok. Sie hat Bauchschmerzen. und will nicht spielen.

translation.en: Doesn't feel well, doesn't want to play.
translation.de: Sie hat Bauchschmerzen. und will nicht spielen.

translation.en: However, I've got a training run. Triathlon's in three weeks.
translation.de: Ich trainiere gerade für den Triathlon...

translation.en: Just go.
[woman] I will. If you're sick I need to make sure you're with someone.
translation.de: Werde ich. Wenn du krank bist, darfst du nicht allein sein

translation.en: It's all right. We can take her for an hour.
translation.de: Wir nehmen sie für eine Stunde.

translation.en: Thanks.
Ugh. I don't know what's wrong with her. It's like she's depressed.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was sie hat. Sie wirkt deprimiert.

translation.en: Doesn't want to go to school, doesn't want to play sports.
translation.de: Sie will nicht zur Schule oder zum Sport.

translation.en: -She's making up the tummy ache thing. -You know, she's at that age. Want me to try talking to her?
translation.de: -Sie täuscht das Bauchweh vor. -Es ist das Alter. Soll ich mit ihr reden?

translation.en: Well, you can try.
I supposed it could be worse. Did you hear about Dante?
translation.de: Könnte schlimmer sein. Hast du von Dante gehört?

translation.en: No. What?
He didn't come home last night. His mother's beside herself.
translation.de: Er kam gestern nicht heim. Seine Mutter ist außer sich.

translation.en: Who'd be a parent?
I'll see you later.
Yeah. Bye.
I was having a surrogate pregnancy. Didn't want people to know.
translation.de: Ich wollte meine Leihmutterschwangerschaft geheim halten.

translation.en: So I used fakepregnancy.co.uk
to pretend that I was going through the normal cycles.
No one suspected a thing.
Sorry I couldn't be there. You were when it counted.
translation.de: -Ich hätte da sein sollen. -Das warst du, als es zählte.

translation.en: [exhales] It's gone.
I've lost it.
[voice on phone] ...two, three, four...
I'm just showing him what teachers get up to outside of school.
translation.de: Ich zeige ihm, was Lehrer außerhalb der Schule machen.

translation.en: -Can I have a word. -What?
Garden.
Okay.
[Corinne] What's going on?
Did you fake your pregnancy?
-What the hell are you talking about? -Can we just skip this part?
-What? -The part where you pretend not to know
what I'm talking about. Let's just skip the denials, okay?
I know you faked your pregnancy.
Well, if you know, why are you asking?
translation.de: Wenn du es weißt, warum fragst du?

translation.en: What about the boys?
-The boys? -Are they mine?
Are you out of your mind?
You faked a pregnancy, Corinne. What else are you capable of?
translation.de: Du hast es vorgetäuscht. Wozu bist du noch fähig?

translation.en: Are they mine?
Yes! Christ, Adam.
Look at Tom's face, your eyes, your-- your-- your hair.
translation.de: Sieh dir Toms Gesicht an, deine Augen, deine Haare.

translation.en: How... How can you even ask me that?
translation.de: Wie kannst du mich so etwas fragen?

translation.en: So... talk to me.
What makes you think I faked a pregnancy?
translation.de: Wie kommst du auf eine Scheinschwangerschaft?

translation.en: Credit card payment. Novelty Funsy.
It's a cover name for a fake pregnancy website.
translation.de: Ein Deckname für eine Website für Scheinschwangerschaften.

translation.en: -Right. How do you know that was for me? -Was it?
translation.de: -Woher weißt du, dass ich das war? -Warst du es?

translation.en: What are you even doing looking through bank statements--?
translation.de: Wieso wühlst du in Bankauszügen herum?

translation.en: Stalling.
Corinne... you lied to me.
You lied to the boys.
Now, you better start talking right now.
Do you remember when I had two school periods off during lunch?
translation.de: Weißt du noch, als ich mittags zwei Freistunden hatte?

translation.en: -What about it? -[sighs]
Well, I used to get out of school for a couple of hours. I'd go to that café in Portis Books.
translation.de: Meist nutzte ich die Zeit und ging in dass Café in Portis Books.

translation.en: I'd get a cup of tea, sit in the corner reading,
translation.de: Ich trank Tee und las etwas.

translation.en: and after a while, Adam, you become a regular.
translation.de: Nach einer Weile, Adam, wurde ich Stammkundin.

translation.en: The same people will be there like a community--
-And? -There was this woman.
She was eight months pregnant. It was her first baby.
translation.de: Sie war im achten Monat mit ihrem ersten Kind.

translation.en: You know how young mothers-to-be are, all glowing and over the top like they're the first person to get pregnant--
translation.de: Junge Mütter glühen förmlich und tun so, als wären sie die ersten...

translation.en: Great story. Can we get back to the fucking elephant sat here?
translation.de: Tolle Geschichte. Kannst du zum Punkt kommen?

translation.en: Can you just drop the sarcasm, Adam? I'm trying to tell you something.
translation.de: Lass den Sarkasmus, Adam. Ich will dir etwas sagen.

translation.en: -So tell me. -I liked her.
We became friendly. And then one day she just stopped coming.
translation.de: Wir wurden Freundinnen. Eines Tages kam sie nicht mehr.

translation.en: Now, I... I just assumed she'd had the baby. She was way overdue.
translation.de: Ich dachte, sie hätte das Baby bekommen. Sie war überfällig.

translation.en: But she didn't reply to any of my messages.
Adam, please listen. And she just killed all my calls--
translation.de: Bitte, hör zu. Sie ignorierte meine Anrufe...

translation.en: -Is this going somewhere? -A few months later,
I saw her again in Starbucks near the library and she was pregnant.
translation.de: sah ich sie bei Starbucks an der Bücherei, und sie war schwanger.

translation.en: Okay.
Heavily pregnant, Adam, like eight months.
So? Well, it didn't make any sense.
So I just-- I held back and I watched her.
And she was with this group of other women in the corner
translation.de: Sie saß mit anderen Frauen in der Ecke

translation.en: holding court, talking to them about... about baby names.
translation.de: und sprach mit ihnen über Babynamen.

translation.en: And when she saw me she just looked terrified.
translation.de: Und als sie mich sah, wirkte sie erschrocken.

translation.en: Did you say something to her?
Yes, I did. She told me some story about having a stillborn. I don't know if it was true--
translation.de: Ja. Sie erzählte von einer Totgeburt. Ich weiß nicht, ob es stimmte...

translation.en: Corinne, what are you talking about?
Please, Adam.
She loved being pregnant. It made her feel special.
translation.de: Sie liebte es, schwanger zu sein. Sie fühlte sich besonders.

translation.en: So she faked a pregnancy?
That's insane.
No, no, Corinne, that is not normal behavior.
translation.de: Nein, Corinne, das ist kein normales Verhalten.

translation.en: Yeah, well, she said her husband didn't care about her. She had no--
translation.de: Sie sagte, ihr Mann ignoriere sie. Sie hatte kein...

translation.en: What does this got to do with us? You've got children, got me.
translation.de: Was hat das mit uns zu tun? Du hast Kinder und mich.

translation.en: What?
Crazy Suzanne and her shitty little life made you think, "I'll fake a baby."
translation.de: Die irre Suzanne macht es vor, und du machst es nach?

translation.en: Why would you do that?
Why would you fake a baby, Corinne?
translation.de: Warum täuschst du ein Baby vor, Corinne?

translation.en: For attention? Is this some kind of deranged midlife crisis?
-Stop. -Okay, I'll stop. But you need to tell me everything from start to finish--
translation.de: -Hör auf. -Ok, aber du musst mir alles erzählen...

translation.en: -No. -What?
I said no.
-You're not just gonna walk away. -What are you gonna do? Keep me captive?
translation.de: -Du bleibst hier. -Willst du mich gefangen halten?

translation.en: You owe me an explanation.
I need some time. Just tell me!
What are you gonna do, Adam? Beat it out of me?
translation.de: Was willst du tun? Es aus mir rausprügeln?

translation.en: How did you find out?
A woman, a stranger. I've never seen her before. -She came up to me and she-- -What woman?
translation.de: -Eine fremde Frau kam zu mir und... -Was für eine Frau?

translation.en: I've just told you, a stranger.
How does she know any of this?
And you, what, you just believed her?
translation.de: Und du hast ihr einfach geglaubt?

translation.en: I just need you... to tell me the truth.
translation.de: Ich will nur, dass du mir die Wahrheit sagst.

translation.en: And I will.
I will, I promise, but just...
-Not like this. Not now. -Corinne?
This is insane. Corinne?
this isn't what you think. There's more to this.
translation.de: Es ist nicht, was du denkst. Es steckt mehr dahinter.

translation.en: So tell me.
Mum?
-Is everything all right? -Everything's fine.
What are they saying?
Still unresponsive.
Indications of moderate brain injury.
Could've hit a tree, could've been something else.
translation.de: Er lief gegen einen Baum oder so.

translation.en: They're guessing he'd been there for hours.
Hours?
-What? -Do you think he jumped?
Why?
We pushed through those trees clothed. They're hard to get through.
translation.de: Wir kamen angezogen kaum durch das Gestrüpp.

translation.en: You aren't darting through at speed and falling down that drop,
translation.de: Man rennt da nicht durch und stürzt ab.

translation.en: you're coming through slowly, thinking, "Whoa, big drop."
translation.de: Man geht langsam durch und denkt: "Ganz schön tief."

translation.en: -But if it was dark-- -If it was dark, you'd go even slower.
translation.de: -Wenn es dunkel war... -Ginge er noch langsamer.

translation.en: Especially with your dick out. Hey, trust me, this is my area of expertise.
translation.de: Gerade, wenn man blankgezogen hat. Da kenne ich mich aus.

translation.en: So why was he naked?
He's run through the woods shedding his clothes.
translation.de: Er rennt durch den Wald und zieht sich aus.

translation.en: Turned on by mutilating an alpaca.
-If they're connected. -If.
-Let's not jump to conclusions. -No, no, sure.
I mean, two really bizarre events happen within a mile of each other.
translation.de: Zwei bizarre Ereignisse geschehen in kurzer Entfernung.

translation.en: Why would they be?
Let's find out who he is first. Check for misper calls.
translation.de: Finden wir heraus, wer er ist und ob er vermisst wird.

translation.en: Someone must be worried this one didn't come home last night.
translation.de: Jemand muss besorgt sein, da er gestern nicht heimkam.

translation.en: I'll bring it over.
My dear.
Just what I need. Thank you.
-Here's to the new Johanna. -Cheers.
Cheers.
No regrets?
-Not yet. -Hmm.
I'll tell you what, I won't miss the snoring.
translation.de: Das Schnarchen wird mir nicht fehlen.

translation.en: He's in the spare room and it's still, like, a thousand decibels.
translation.de: Selbst aus dem Gästezimmer klingt es wie 1.000 Dezibel.

translation.en: Listen to you.
What?
"Like, a thousand decibels." That infant's rubbing off on you.
translation.de: "Tausend Dezibel." Der Kleine färbt auf dich ab.

translation.en: There's another good reason to retire.
Let's do the trip.
Come on. I mean, you're gonna be out of a job.
translation.de: Komm schon. Deine Laufbahn endet bald.

translation.en: You're out of your marriage. We always said we'd do it, Johanna.
translation.de: Deine Ehe auch. Wir wollten es immer machen, Johanna.

translation.en: You've got this place.
Yeah, which can be looked after.
And two dogs.
And a husband that can look after them.
translation.de: Auf die passt mein Mann auf.

translation.en: Come on.
Me and you, Thelma and Louise across the states.
translation.de: Du und ich, Thelma und Louise in den Staaten.

translation.en: All we've gotta do is book the flights and we're doing it.
translation.de: Wir müssen nur die Flüge buchen und abhauen.

translation.en: [in Southern accent] "I'm in deep shit, Thelma. -Deep shit, Arkinsaw." -[chuckles]
translation.de: "Ich stecke tief in der Scheiße, Thelma. Im Scheiß-Arkinsaw."

translation.en: Listen. Um...
What you said yesterday, you were right.
translation.de: Was du gestern gesagt hast, stimmt.

translation.en: You deserve to know everything.
translation.de: Du verdienst es, es zu wissen.

translation.en: And I want to explain, I do.
translation.de: Und ich will es dir erklären,

translation.en: But not like this, Adam.
Not angry.
We have this school awards thing tonight.
Why don't we just eat after at Juniper Yard?
translation.de: Wollen wir danach im Juniper Yard essen?

translation.en: We can eat and I'll talk,
and then... then we can see where we are.
translation.de: und dann sehen wir, wo wir stehen.

translation.en: You know the worst part about all of this?
translation.de: Weißt du, was das Schlimmste daran ist?

translation.en: I've stopped trusting you.
I know.
It hurts, doesn't it?
We all have our secrets, Adam.
Even you.
His name's Dante Gunnarsson. His parents reported him missing yesterday.
translation.de: Er heißt Dante Gunnarsson und ist seit gestern vermisst gemeldet.

translation.en: He spends a lot of time out and about so they weren't immediately concerned.
translation.de: Er ist oft unterwegs. Darum waren die Eltern nicht besorgt.

translation.en: -Are they with him? -At the hospital.
He's stable but unresponsive. They're doing an EEG this morning.
translation.de: Stabil, nicht ansprechbar. Sie machen heute ein EEG.

translation.en: In the meantime...
"The lacerations on the animal are from human teeth."
translation.de: "Die Bissspuren am Tier sind von einem Menschen."

translation.en: But...
"Human bite is usually an elliptical injury.
However, in this case, the pattern is interrupted
translation.de: In diesem Fall wird das Muster durch das Fehlen

translation.en: by the absence of a left bicuspid."
I rang the hospital. Our boy has all his teeth.
translation.de: Ich war im Krankenhaus. Unser Junge hat alle Zähne.

translation.en: So, there's someone else.
There's someone else.
Bob, hello.
Have you seen Corinne? Nowhere, no.
Oh, Vicky, can I have a word?
translation.de: Vicky, kann ich dich kurz sprechen?

translation.en: I just wanted to ask, and it's probably not a huge deal,
translation.de: Es ist sicher keine große Sache,

translation.en: but your Ella, she's stopped talking with Mia.
translation.de: aber deine Ella hat aufgehört, mit Mia zu reden.

translation.en: And Mia said something's happened, but she won't say what it is.
translation.de: Mia sagte, etwas wäre vorgefallen, aber sie sagte nicht, was.

translation.en: Do you have any idea what's going on?
No. No, none at all.
Well, there's something strange. I just thought you should know.
translation.de: Irgendetwas ist seltsam. Ich dachte, du solltest es wissen.

translation.en: She's been a bit down but...
I'm sure it's nothing serious.
-Hi. This is Corinne. Leave a message. -[beeps]
Sadly, I must begin this evening of celebration with some difficult news.
translation.de: Leider muss ich den Abend mit traurigen Neuigkeiten einleiten.

translation.en: One of our year 12 pupils, Dante Gunnarsson,
has been involved in a serious accident.
translation.de: war in einen schweren Unfall verwickelt.

translation.en: And I'm afraid he's in a very worrying condition.
I'm sure you will all join me in wishing him and his family
translation.de: Gemeinsam wünschen wir ihm und seiner Familie

translation.en: all the best for his swift recovery.
translation.de: alles Gute und eine schnelle Genesung.

translation.en: But we must carry on in difficult times,
translation.de: Aber auch in schwierigen Zeiten müssen wir weitermachen.

translation.en: and this evening is about celebrating those students who have achieved
translation.de: Heute Abend geht es darum, die Schüler zu feiern,

translation.en: or excelled... in this, their final year, of high school.
translation.de: die in ihrem letzten Schuljahr durch besondere Leistungen auffielen.

translation.en: And the award for art goes to Kiran Penvell.
translation.de: Und der Preis für Kunst geht an Kiran Penvell.

translation.en: Michelle Vosler.
And the one you've all been waiting for,
the most visible underwear award...
No, seriously.
The award for best sporting achievement goes to Anthony Carter.
translation.de: Der Preis für die beste Sportleistung geht an Anthony Carter.

translation.en: Go on!
The final award this evening is our award, the students',
translation.de: Der letzte Preis heute Abend wird von uns Schülern vergeben.

translation.en: and we were asked to vote for our teacher of the year.
translation.de: Wir sollten den Lehrer des Jahres wählen.

translation.en: And I've been asked to say
that it has been a really close competition, as they're all so great.
translation.de: dass es sehr knapp war, weil sie alle toll sind.

translation.en: Sadly, there can only be one winner.
And that person is...
Hi. I'm not Mrs. Price, obviously.
translation.de: Hallo. Ich bin nicht Mrs. Price, wie man sieht.

translation.en: Uh, Corinne can't be here tonight.
translation.de: Corinne kann heute nicht hier sein.

translation.en: She's, um...
She's unwell.
But I'd just like to say how much this'll mean to her. She...
translation.de: Aber der Preis bedeutet ihr sehr viel. Sie...

translation.en: loves this job, it's her life, and, uh...
translation.de: Sie liebt diesen Job, er ist ihr Leben und...

translation.en: she's always cherished the work that she does...
translation.de: Sie hat viel Freude an ihrer Arbeit...

translation.en: bringing literature to life and...
encouraging you lot to fall in love with... language, words.
translation.de: ...junge Leute dazu zu bringen, sich für Sprache und Worte zu begeistern.

translation.en: And as her husband, her passion and...
translation.de: Und als ihr Ehemann, habe ich ihre Leidenschaft und...

translation.en: belief in what she does is something that I've...
always deeply admired.
But I will give this to her
and she can come and tell you herself when she feels better. Cheers.
translation.de: und wenn es ihr besser geht, sagt sie es euch selbst. Danke.

translation.en: Think she'll be at home?
I don't know.
-How can you not know where she is? -Well, do you?
translation.de: -Warum weißt du es nicht? -Weißt du es?

translation.en: Sorry, mate.
It's fine, okay?
Mum just didn't feel up to it tonight.
translation.de: Mom hat sich heute nicht wohlgefühlt.

translation.en: Now you know she's a liar.
translation.de: Jetzt wissen Sie, dass sie lügt.

translation.en: There's more to this.
